attributes.action: LET PEOPLE OF GB SEE Mrs Mays PROPOSAL & ALLOW THE PEOPLE TO VOTE IT THROUGH
attributes.additional_details: There is too much to lose if we stay in the EU. We have no control over our borders or trade agreements. It is now time after more than two years of MPs pussyfooting around without a concrete deal in place to vote again how and when we leave the EU.
attributes.background: The government are rejecting every option for a smooth exit of the European Union. Now let the people have a say in which way forward we now go. We chose to leave the EU, now let us choose how we leave and when we leave regardless of what MPs say.
